programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: The Hunt For Atlantis: New clues narrow down the possible location of Atlantis and suggest that Plato's mysterious island was the home of an advanced civilisation. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Man Beasts: We're all fascinated by mysteries. But is the unexplained really unexplainable? William Shatner investigates in an attempt to find a logical explanation. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind The Deal
programme.desc: Watch Your Back: This was the deal that nearly broke the Golds. Go behind the scenes and find out what really happened when Les allowed a $60,000 watch to walk out the door. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: The Mystery of Puma Punku. Experts in the extra-terrestrial examine the Inca ruin and its mysteriously intricate carved blocks. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: Alien Messages: Could some of our ancient texts and structures be home to secret messages left by alien ancestors? If so, what can we learn from them? (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 13)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: New. Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 67)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry and Sam head to an automotive show in Chippenham. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The Ninja And The Pitmaster: A stranger on a motorbike raises prices and eyebrows at in DeSoto. With just four lockers up for grabs, the bidding wars are fiercer than ever. (S4, ep 7)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawnfellas: The team check out a World War II mortar, handcuffs from an iconic prison and a bar of soap that doubles up as an obesity cure.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Crazy Cash: The Detroit family pawn shop opens its doors on dodgy sellers, angry dealers, staff rifts and everything from a gynaecologist's table to an elephant's skull. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: The Big Bet: Series following a Detroit pawn shop owner and his family as they buy and sell items to family, employees and regular customers. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind The Deal
programme.desc: Tripped Out Cash: Look back with the Golds as they recall the smartest and the stupidest deals that stick in the memory, plus those deals too difficult to resist. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: Nazi Time Travelers: Experts join the trail of purported Nazi time travel device, Die Glocke. Did it really exist? And could it have been based on alien technology? (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Where There's Smoke: The Skinwalker team broadcasts a mysterious signal recorded on the property over the airwaves of a local radio station that evokes a stunning UAP response. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Two-Headed Serpent and Mummified Monster: A mysterious creature is discovered in Russia, a possible genetic experiment goes wrong and a fire has a mind of its own. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Apocalyptic Lights & Baby Sharkman: A baby shark develops an eerie, humanlike face. Meanwhile, a possible alien invasion takes place over Lake Superior. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice
programme.desc: Experts and scientists expose more dark secrets, forgotten treasures, and lost relics from some of the coldest places on Earth. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A Dam Good Road Trip: An antique heater gets Chum's temperature rising. Rick is dazzled by an impressive sculpture and the guys hit the road to travel an iconic American highway.

programme.title: New: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry and Sam try to make a profit on memorabilia at the Bristol Classic Car Show. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Mysteries of Alaska: The vast Alaskan wilderness is known for disappearances, stories of strange creatures and UFO sightings. Could this be due to an otherworldly presence? (S15, ep 8)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Aliens in Our Airspace: Eerie encounters at 40,000 feet, accounts of UFOs taking control of aircraft, and jumbo jets disappearing. Is this proof of aliens in our airspace? (S15, ep 9)

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: The Mystery Of Loch Ness: Giorgio Tsoukalos investigates whether sightings of the Loch Ness monster could be caused by a disturbance in the space-time continuum. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - bydd cysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae! Join Jam on a musical adventure full of interesting sounds and pictures!

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae pawb yn Ocido wedi gwirioni ar y persawr newydd a grëwyd gan Maer Oci. Ond beth sydd wedi cynhyrfu'r gwenyn? Maer Oci creates a perfume that everyone adores but why are the bees upset?

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn cwrdd a rhai o aelodau ifanc Clwb Triathlon Caerdydd, ac awn ni i gasglu afalau gyda Aneira, Lleuwen a Gwenllian. Meleri goes swimming with Jayden at Pontypridd Lido.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cyfres animeddedig gyda chaneuon a hwiangerddi traddodiadol a chyfoes. Cân ystumiau sy'n llawn egni yw "Nol a Mlaen". "Nol a Mlaen" is an energetic song full of fun gestures.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Leisa a Betsan yn mynd ar antur i ddarganfod sut mae selsig yn cael eu gwneud gyda Hywel y ffermwr hud. Leisa and Betsan go on an adventure to find out how sausages are made.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: New: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Guto Gwningen heddiw, tybed? What's happening in Guto Gwningen's world today?

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith Yn Ol

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Babi Snwff wedi syrthio o'i nyth felly mae'r Olobobs yn mynd ati i greu Stepensawrws i helpu Babi Snwff yn ôl i'w nyth. The Olobobs create Stepnesawrws to help rescue Babi Snwff.

programme.title: Twt

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae gan y Capten gannwyll, Seren fflachlamp, ond mae Fflwff yn defnyddio'r tywyllwch i sylwi'n well ar y tân gwyllt tu allan. The electricity's on the blink. How will the crew see anything?

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Pan mae Magi'n cynhaeafu kohlrabi, mae Jay a Mario'n siwr bod aliwn wedi dod i Bentre Braf. Jay and Mario are convinced that aliens have come to Pentre Braf!

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae sbectol Harri wedi torri, ac er i Harri drio ei thrwsio, mae angen iddo gael sbectol newydd. Harri's glasses are broken, although Harri tried to fix them, he needs new glasses.

programme.title: Sam Tan

programme.title: Da 'Di Dona

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Betsi yn meddwl ei bod wedi rhoi swyn ar Conyn a'i wneud yn gawr. Betsi thinks she's turned Conyn into a giant! Cochyn and Digbi explain they've just seen him and he's the right size!

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau

programme.title: Sigldigwt

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: 'Beth yw llosgfynydd?' yw cwestiwn Gweni heddiw. Mae gan Tad-cu ateb dwl am Pegi'r Pengwin oedd eisiau bod yn gogydd byd-enwog! Gweni asks 'What is a volcano?' and Grandpa spins a tale.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Ma Jetboi a Jetferch yn anghytuno, ond pan fydd Lili Lafant yn hypnoteiddio dinasyddion i'w ufuddhau hi ma'r gwahaniaethau'n troi'n gryfder. Lily Lafant hypnotizes citizens into obeying her.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd

programme.title: Blociau Rhif

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd

programme.title: Pablo

programme.desc: Mae Llew wedi cyffroi'n lân. Mae'n credu ei fod yn ben-blwydd arno heddiw! Yn anffodus, yfory mae ei ben-blwydd. Llew thinks it's his birthday but it's not until tomorrow. He's confused!

programme.title: Kim a Cêt a Twrch

programme.title: Pen Llyn Harri Parri

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
